sections.title: Special Ability Types
sections.description: Rules for the three main types of special abilities: extraordinary, spell-like, and supernatural abilities, including how they interact with magic suppression, dispelling, and spell resistance

sections.title: Sight and Vision Abilities
sections.description: Rules for special vision and sight abilities including blindsight, blindsense, darkvision, and low-light vision

sections.title: Channel Resistance
sections.description: Rules for channel resistance ability that provides bonus on Will saves against channeled energy

sections.title: Charm and Compulsion
sections.description: Comprehensive rules for charm and compulsion effects, including how charmed creatures behave, limitations, and breaking free

sections.title: Damage Reduction
sections.description: Complete rules for damage reduction including how it works, what it blocks, overcoming DR with special materials and enhancement bonuses

sections.title: Death Attacks
sections.description: Rules for death attacks that can instantly kill, including saves, resurrection restrictions, and protections

sections.title: Energy Drain and Negative Levels
sections.description: Complete rules for negative levels from energy drain, including penalties, temporary vs permanent negative levels, and removal

sections.title: Energy Immunity, Vulnerability, and Resistance
sections.description: Rules for energy immunity (complete protection), vulnerability (50% extra damage), and resistance (reduces damage by fixed amount)

sections.title: Ethereal
sections.description: Rules for ethereal creatures including movement, interaction with material plane, force effects, and combat limitations

sections.title: Fear Effects
sections.description: Complete rules for fear effects including shaken, frightened, and panicked conditions, fear auras, and cumulative fear

sections.title: Invisibility
sections.description: Comprehensive rules for invisibility including detection, attacking invisible creatures, concealment, and special interactions

sections.title: Paralysis
sections.description: Rules for paralysis effects that immobilize creatures, including limitations and effects on flying/swimming creatures

sections.title: Scent
sections.description: Complete rules for the scent ability including detection ranges, tracking, environmental effects, and interactions with stealth

sections.title: Spell Resistance
sections.description: Comprehensive rules for spell resistance including caster level checks, when it applies to different spell types, and voluntarily lowering SR
